8\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\r\n\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2584\u2580\u2591\u2591\u2588\r\n\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2588\r\n*/\r\n\r\n\r\n#include <bits/stdc++.h>\r\n#define ll long long\r\n#include <ext/pb_ds/assoc_container.hpp>\r\n#include <ext/pb_ds/tree_policy.hpp>\r\nusing namespace __gnu_pbds;\r\nusing namespace std;\r\n#define ull unsigned long long\r\n#define NUM 1e18\r\n#define Mod 1'000'000'007\r\n#define OO 2'000'000'000\r\n#define all(v) ((v).begin()), ((v).end())\r\n#define allr(v) ((v).rbegin()), ((v).rend())\r\n#define sz(v) ((ll)((v).size()))\r\n#define Ceil(a , b) ((a / b) + (a % b ? 1 : 0))\r\n#define is_small(c) (c >= 97 && c <= 122)\r\n#define is_cap(c) (c >= 65 && c <= 90)\r\n#define cin(v)   for (auto &i : v)  cin >> i;\r\n#define cinp(v)   for (auto &i : v) cin >> i.first >> i.second;\r\n#define coutp(v)   for (auto &i : v) cout << i.first << \" \" << i.second << \"\\n\";\r\n#define cin2D(v)    for (auto &i : v)  for (auto &j : i) cin >> j;\r\n#define cout2D(v)    for (auto &i : v) {  for (auto &j : i) {  cout << j; } cout << \"\\n\";}\r\n#define cout(v)       for (auto &i : v)  cout << i << \" \"; cout << \"\\n\";\r\n#define fixed(n) cout << fixed << setprecision(n);\r\n#define END(n) return void(cout << n <<\"\\n\") ;\r\n#define ret( ) return void( ) ;\r\n#define nl cout << \"\\n\";\r\n#define Digits(n) 1 + floor(log10(n))  \r\n#define is_vow(c) (c == 'a' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' || c == 'i' || c == 'e')\r\nconst ll NO = 1073741824;\r\nconst float si = 0.16666666666666666666666666666667;\r\n//getline( cin>>ws , s )\r\n \r\nvoid fast_io()\r\n{\r\n  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(nullptr), cout.tie(nullptr);\r\n#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE\r\n  freopen(\"input.txt\", \"r\", stdin), freopen(\"output.txt\", \"w\", stdout);\r\n#endif\r\n}\r\n \r\nconst int N = 1e7 + 5;\r\nvector < bool > is_prime(N, true);\r\nvector < ll > primes;\r\nvoid Sieve_prime(){\r\n    is_prime[0] = false;\r\n    is_prime[1] = false;\r\n    for(long long i = 2; i * i < N; i++)\r\n        if(is_prime[i])\r\n            for(int j = 2 * i; j < N; j += i)\r\n                is_prime[j] = false;\r\n \r\n    for(int i = 0; i < N ; i++){\r\n        if(is_prime[i])\r\n            primes.push_back(i);\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n\r\n//************************* solve function ***************************************************\r\n  void solve()\r\n {   \r\n    ll a , b , c , val = 0 ; cin >> a >> b >> c ;\r\n    \r\n    if(min(b , a/c) == b) \r\n     END(b) ; \r\n    \r\n    if(min(b , a/c) == a/c) \r\n     b -= a/c ; \r\n\r\n    if(b == 1 && a/c == 1)  END(0) ;\r\n    \r\n    if((a/c) - 1 >= b) END((a/c)-1) ;\r\n    \r\n    val = (b+1)/((a/c)-1) ;\r\n    cout << (a/c)-val <<\"\\n\" ;\r\n\r\n }     \r\n//************************ solution ****************************************************\r\nint main() \r\n{\r\n    fast_io();\r\n  //Sieve_prime() ; \r\n  int t = 1 ;   cin >> t;\r\n  while (t--)\r\n    solve();  \r\n  return 0;\r\n} \r\n   "
}
